original_title: GroundBreaking - The Story of the First Skate Plaza
overview: This documentary is part skate video and part instructional video, outlining how Rob Dyrdek and DC Shoes designed and built a 40,000 square foot skate plaza in Kettering, OH. Being Rob's home town, Kettering came to him to help design a skate plaza for the local skaters. At the time, it was the first project of this magnitude designed expressly for skaters.
title: GroundBreaking - The Story of the First Skate Plaza
